rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural lighting and ventilation, positioned towards the east for auspicious Vastu principles.
Functional kitchen space optimized for energy efficiency using eco-friendly appliances. Includes a small herb garden window facing north for optimal light.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room and kitchen.
Master bedroom with attached balcony on the south-west side for fresh air and privacy, aligning with Vastu orientation for relaxation.
Bedroom with a spacious balcony oriented towards the east to harness morning sunlight. Designed with eco-friendly materials.
Bedroom designed for privacy with access to central courtyard for better ventilation and natural light.
Smaller bedroom intended as guest or extra space; includes a small balcony on the north side in line with Vastu principles.
Master bathroom adjacent to master bedroom with water-efficient fixtures and natural light from north windows.
Compact servant's quarters integrated at the rear of the house ensuring privacy while remaining close to main areas.

openings.description: Main entrance on the north side with a covered walkway leading into central courtyard for energy conservation and security.
Balcony opening adjacent to master bedroom with greenery view, ensuring natural cooling.
Spacious balcony for bedroom 2 promoting natural light and ventilation.
Central courtyard accessible from living room and bedrooms for communal space and natural cooling.
